member.name: F:CSFundamentalsTests.Algorithms.Sort.Constants.ArrayWithSortedDistinctValues

member.name: F:CSFundamentalsTests.Algorithms.Sort.Constants.ArrayWithSortedDuplicateValues

member.name: F:CSFundamentalsTests.Algorithms.Sort.Constants.ArrayWithReverselySortedDistinctValues
member.summary: Is an array of integers with distinct values, such that the array is reversely sorted, meaning it is descending, whereas sort meant ascending.

member.name: F:CSFundamentalsTests.Algorithms.Sort.Constants.ArrayWithReverselySortedDuplicateValues
member.summary: Is an array of integers with duplicate values, such that the array is reversely sorted, meaning it is descending, whereas sort meant ascending.

member.name: T:CSFundamentalsTests.DataStructures.Trees.Binary.API.MockBinaryTreeNode`2
member.summary: This class is only created for testing purposes. TreeNode is an abstract class with generic types, and some method implementations. We need to test those methods without using any child class in production code. Therefore this mock class is created.

Specifies type of the values in a tree.
